en: I think we'll meet again. Do not be late.
Something is wrong? You're kind of lost.
.. I was just thinking. A very strange feeling, not even described in words.
Wow, maybe you will go with us then?
I do not know. Somewhere. You haven’t been anywhere else. You sat all summer in your room.
You, too. I did not think that there are still people who appreciate such simple moments.
Tomorrow we have initiation into students
The bus will take you to the place of celebration
Yes, be sure to come, last year was a lot of fun!
